results.title: Effects of simvastatin in patients with viral chronic hepatitis C.
results.text_hl: Those @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Chemical_and_Drug_Induced_Liver_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D056486 @@@hepatic cytolysis@@@ were placed in group B and treated for 3 months with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@. The @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ were biologically monitored monthly and the initial @<m>DISEASE_Viremia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014766 @@@viremia@@@ was compared with the final one.

citations.NLM: Mihaila RG, Nedelcu L, Fratila O, Retzler L, Domnariu C, Cipaian RC, Rezi EC, Beca C, Deac M. Effects of simvastatin in patients with viral chronic hepatitis C. Hepatogastroenterology. 2011 Jul-Aug;58(109):1296-300. PMID: 21937398
